content: while i adore the vinyl record coaster patterns that already exist i really wanted a vintage 45 look for this project this is my first published pattern and i m really proud of it the plastic canvas turntable is not part of these instructions but i posted my wip photos on my instagram account along with the youtube tutorials i used to create it you can find that post here 1 and the links in the highlight called turntable thank you for stopping by single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet single_crochet increase = single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet into one stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch materials used 4 5 mm hook tapestry needle medium weight yarn in 2 colors color a and black inspiration lavendeer yarnings 1 https //www instagram com/p/cznnvgptfyv/ igshid=y2nkyjk0mdhjyg==
